definition: to be all talk and no action
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance

sentences.english: to say things and never do them is second nature.
A man of words and not of deeds is like a garden full of weeds.
sentences.chinese: 一個只說不做的人就像一個長滿野草的花園。

sentences.english: A man of words and not of deeds is like a garden full ofweeds.
sentences.chinese: 只說不做的人，猶如光長野草的花園。

sentences.english: Google makes lots of vague promises, and seems to not deliver.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌作出很多模糊承諾，而且似乎只說不做。

sentences.english: Jack's just another of these hypocrites who are pacifists in word but not in deed.
sentences.chinese: 傑克恰好又是一個只說不做的和平主義者僞君子。

sentences.english: She is a person who talks () but () () . I'm angry with her.
sentences.chinese: 她是個只說不做的人，我很生她的氣。
